title: GH#2065: Normalize text to NFD consistently
description: Normalize all text to NFD throughout the system for consistent Unicode handling. GitHub issue #2065

title: GH#2092: Linq2Db timezone bug
description: Linq2Db not handling timezones correctly. GitHub issue #2092

title: GH#2002: Advanced filters - add fields to FW Lite
description: Add advanced filter capability to FW Lite. GitHub issue #2002

title: GH#2057: Sync appears successful but S/R failed
description: Sync shows success but SendReceive actually failed. Misleading UX. GitHub issue #2057

title: CRDT sync stops auto-downloading changes from other users
description: The app can enter a state where it stops automatically downloading changes from other users. This is in the CRDT sync code (backend/FwLite/LocalWebApp + MiniLcm.Project). Needs investigation to understand what state causes this.

title: GH#2108: CanSyncRandomEntries failure - Affixes field
description: Fieldname 'Affixes' does not exist when testing FwData API. Related to MorphTypes. GitHub issue #2108

title: GH#2062: Partial syncs cause duplicate changes in history
description: Partial syncs write duplicate changes to history because pending changes dont clear properly. GitHub issue #2062

title: GH#2082: UI to check for updates in FW Lite
description: Add UI to check for software updates in FW Lite. GitHub issue #2082

title: GH#2052: S/R failed, rolled back but lost CRDT changes
description: Sync failed and rolled back, but user lost CRDT changes. Data loss scenario. GitHub issue #2052

title: Create nested AGENTS.md files for monorepo
description: Add AGENTS.md files to key subdirectories to give AI agents scoped context. Root AGENTS.md exists, need subdirectory-specific ones.

title: AGENTS.md for backend/
description: .NET conventions, EF Core patterns, shared testing, Directory.Build.props

title: AGENTS.md for frontend/ (LexBox web app)
description: SvelteKit app for LexBox web interface. Project management, user auth, org admin.

title: AGENTS.md for frontend/viewer/ (FwLite web UI)
description: SvelteKit frontend for FwLite. Dictionary editing, CRDT sync UI, MiniLcm integration. DIFFERENT from parent frontend/.

title: AGENTS.md for backend/FwLite/
description: FwLite backend: MAUI app, MiniLcm API, CRDT sync, LocalDbContext

title: AGENTS.md for backend/LexBoxApi/
description: Main API: GraphQL (Hot Chocolate), auth, project/org management

title: AGENTS.md for backend/FwHeadless/
description: Headless service: hg sync, FwData processing, SendReceive
